alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Clay (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 01 at 4:09AM EDT until November 02 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT /9 AM CDT/ THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT EDT /11 PM CDT/ TONIGHT TO 9 AM EDT /8 AM CDT/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning this morning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. For the second Freeze Warning tonight, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest North Carolina and east Tennessee. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 10 AM EDT /9 AM CDT/ this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from midnight EDT /11 PM CDT/ tonight to 9 AM EDT /8 AM CDT/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
